hero.title: Meet ISAAC, the ultimate academic advising sidekick!
hero.subtitle: With ISAAC, advisers can effortlessly answer student questions without needing to schedule an appointment and take academic advising to the next level.

why.title: Why should you choose ISAAC?
why.subtitle: We have upgraded upon the current experience for the advisers to easily maintain and distribute information to students, and for the students to consume information in a quick, searchable manner.

features.text: A search engine to allow students to quickly find answers to their questions.
features.attribution: Web portal icons created by Vectors Tank - Flaticon

features.text: Static-Site Generation for fast loading times, SEO, and easy deployment.
features.attribution: Gear icons created by DinosoftLabs - Flaticon

features.text: Data analytic dashboards to enable advisers to make data-driven decisions.
features.attribution: Dashboard icons created by Eucalyp - Flaticon

features.text: The ability for advisers to easily add, update, remove, and import HTML
features.attribution: Text editor icons created by Noor Hakim - Flaticon

team.subtitle: It all started with our personal experiences as undergraduate INFO students of the iSchool...

journey.text_1_1: Appointments had to be scheduled a month in advance, and emails for general questions were not able to be answered in a timely manner.
journey.text_1: Alan reached out to the advising team with a basic inquiry about VLPA credit equivalency for the three foreign language classes he took at the Bothell campus.
journey.text_3: Alan reached out again to follow up with his inquiry four months later.
journey.text_4:
Response received! 
 'I apologize for the delayed response. Our office was short staffed, and many emails got buried in our inbox - I saw that your message was still unresolved...' â€” an iSchool Adviser
journey.text_6: We defined the information problem and threw together a presentation proposal pitch...
journey.text_7: On December 12th,  2022, we met with the iSchool Advising Team to discuss this problem:

advisers.title: iSchool Advising Team
aspects: Post-COVID, email inquiries for simple, objective questions that don't require human interaction have increased exponentially.
In 2022, the iSchool enrolled 839 students and plans to admit up to 1,400 annually in the future, which will result in a heavier workload for the advising team.
The existing Canvas Informatics Resource Site... TODO

scale.title: How does ISAAC scale?
scale.subtitle: We focused on building ISAAC into a modular, scalable system that will allow for future expansion and integration with external applications.

e.text: A centralized, accessible information repository to store information by advisers for students.
e.title: Information Repository

e.text: A website that allows students to search and browse for answers to their simple, objective questions.
e.title: ISAAC Website

e.text: Data analytics experience to help advisers make data-driven decisions.
e.title: Metrics and Data Analytics

e.text: A decoupled, external API for other applications to consume ISAAC information.
e.title: ISAAC API

e.text: External applications that consume the ISAAC API for students and advisers such as an AI Chatbot.
e.title: External Application Integrations
